name: For Lily
description:
Take the role of Alex, an angel bringing two adventurers, Mushi and Fuix, into the soul of the titular character Lily. Together you'll explore her soul-space, discovering more about her, the relationships she had with your party members, and even the man who killed her. All of this will be taking place from the view point of your trio, quite a ways into an ongoing adventure. 

For Lily is an RPG made using RPG Maker XP. It was originally intended to be part of a 24 hour self-imposed development challenge, but it was too fun to stop so soon. Consequently, the game has gotten a lot more polish and content. For Lily may be updated with patches and bug fixes in the future, if anything arises.

This game was made to be free, and you should never have to pay money for it. However, if you have interest in donations, do so only of your own accord! It was made out of love, not greed.


Compatibility:
RPG Maker XP made games are typically compatible with most Windows OS. For Lily has been tested on XP and Win10. RPG Maker XP doesn't support MAC OS to my knowledge. If you have compatibility issues, bugs, or any problems I encourage commenting them and the game might get a patch, depending.

Credits:
